verses.roman:
cala, sabe yāi sārvabhaumera bhavana
prabhu dekhi' pāche kariba īśvara darśana'

synonyms: cala—let us go; sabe—all; yāi—we shall go; sārvabhaumera bhavana—to the house of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; prabhu dekhi'-seeing Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; pāche—later; kariba—we shall do; īśvara darśana—seeing of Lord Jagannātha.
translation: "First let us all go to the house of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya and see Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Later we shall come to see Lord Jagannātha."
